description:
In this video we take a look at how you can turn A Used $120 2022 Moto EDGE+ into a desktop PC using Moto Ready Or Moto Connect! This Is not Samsung DEX but it has come a very long way! This android phone is powered by the snapdragon 8 Gen 1 and it still holds its own when it come to gaming, emulation, Work and Media playback. This can also be a game console and emulation machine its up to you! Motorolas Desktop mode is perfect for traveling and trips!
